00032 void printhelp()
00033 {
00034     RAVELOG_INFO("orcollision [--list] [--checker checker_name] [--joints #values [values]] body_model\n");
00035 }
00036 
00037 void printinterfaces(EnvironmentBasePtr penv)
00038 {
00039     std::map<InterfaceType, std::vector<std::string> > interfacenames;
00040     RaveGetLoadedInterfaces(interfacenames);
00041     stringstream ss;
00042 
00043     ss << endl << "Loadable interfaces: " << endl;
00044     for(std::map<InterfaceType, std::vector<std::string> >::iterator itinterface = interfacenames.begin(); itinterface != interfacenames.end(); ++itinterface) {
00045         ss << RaveGetInterfaceName(itinterface->first) << "(" << itinterface->second.size() << "):" << endl;
00046         for(vector<string>::iterator it = itinterface->second.begin(); it != itinterface->second.end(); ++it)
00047             ss << " " << *it << endl;
00048         ss << endl;
00049     }
00050     RAVELOG_INFO(ss.str());
00051 }
00052 
00053 int main(int argc, char ** argv)
00054 {
00055     if( argc < 2 ) {
00056         printhelp();
00057         return -1; // no robots to load
00058     }
00059 
00060     RaveInitialize(true); // start openrave core
00061     EnvironmentBasePtr penv = RaveCreateEnvironment(); // create the main environment
00062     vector<dReal> vsetvalues;
00063 
00064     // parse the command line options
00065     int i = 1;
00066     while(i < argc) {
00067         if((strcmp(argv[i], "-h") == 0)||(strcmp(argv[i], "-?") == 0)||(strcmp(argv[i], "/?") == 0)||(strcmp(argv[i], "--help") == 0)||(strcmp(argv[i], "-help") == 0)) {
00068             printhelp();
00069             return 0;
00070         }
00071         else if( strcmp(argv[i], "--checker") == 0 ) {
00072             // create requested collision checker
00073             CollisionCheckerBasePtr pchecker = RaveCreateCollisionChecker(penv,argv[i+1]);
00074             if( !pchecker ) {
00075                 RAVELOG_ERROR("failed to create checker %s\n", argv[i+1]);
00076                 return -3;
00077             }
00078             penv->SetCollisionChecker(pchecker);
00079             i += 2;
00080         }
00081         else if( strcmp(argv[i], "--list") == 0 ) {
00082             printinterfaces(penv);
00083             return 0;
00084         }
00085         else if( strcmp(argv[i], "--joints") == 0 ) {
00086             vsetvalues.resize(atoi(argv[i+1]));
00087             for(int j = 0; j < (int)vsetvalues.size(); ++j)
00088                 vsetvalues[j] = atoi(argv[i+j+2]);
00089 
00090             i += 2+vsetvalues.size();
00091         }
00092         else
00093             break;
00094     }
00095 
00096     if( i >= argc ) {
00097         RAVELOG_ERROR("not enough parameters\n");
00098         printhelp();
00099         return 1;
00100     }
00101 
00102     // load the scene
00103     if( !penv->Load(argv[i]) ) {
00104         return 2;
00105     }
00106 
00107     // lock the environment to prevent thigns from changes
00108     EnvironmentMutex::scoped_lock lock(penv->GetMutex());
00109 
00110     vector<KinBodyPtr> vbodies;
00111     penv->GetBodies(vbodies);
00112     // get the first body
00113     if( vbodies.size() == 0 ) {
00114         RAVELOG_ERROR("no bodies loaded\n");
00115         return -3;
00116     }
00117 
00118     KinBodyPtr pbody = vbodies.at(0);
00119     vector<dReal> values;
00120     pbody->GetDOFValues(values);
00121 
00122     // set new values
00123     for(int i = 0; i < (int)vsetvalues.size() && i < (int)values.size(); ++i) {
00124         values[i] = vsetvalues[i];
00125     }
00126     pbody->SetDOFValues(values,true);
00127 
00128     int contactpoints = 0;
00129     CollisionReportPtr report(new CollisionReport());
00130     penv->GetCollisionChecker()->SetCollisionOptions(CO_Contacts);
00131     if( pbody->CheckSelfCollision(report) ) {
00132         contactpoints = (int)report->contacts.size();
00133         stringstream ss;
00134         ss << "body in self-collision "
00135            << (!!report->plink1 ? report->plink1->GetName() : "") << ":"
00136            << (!!report->plink2 ? report->plink2->GetName() : "") << " at "
00137            << contactpoints << "contacts" << endl;
00138         for(int i = 0; i < contactpoints; ++i) {
00139             CollisionReport::CONTACT& c = report->contacts[i];
00140             ss << "contact" << i << ": pos=("
00141                << c.pos.x << ", " << c.pos.y << ", " << c.pos.z << "), norm=("
00142                << c.norm.x << ", " << c.norm.y << ", " << c.norm.z << ")" << endl;
00143         }
00144 
00145         RAVELOG_INFOA(ss.str());
00146     }
00147     else {
00148         RAVELOG_INFO("body not in collision\n");
00149     }
00150 
00151     // get the transformations of all the links
00152     vector<Transform> vlinktransforms;
00153     pbody->GetLinkTransformations(vlinktransforms);
00154 
00155     penv->Destroy(); // destroy
00156     return contactpoints;
00157 }
